WorkItem.Description:
I recommend editing the Upcoming Events GridView on default.aspx to convert the "starttime" column to a template in order for the date to show up in short format.
Â 
<asp:TemplateField HeaderText="starttime" SortExpression="starttime">
    <ItemTemplate>
        <asp:Label ID="Label2" 
                   runat="server" 
                   Text='<%# Bind("starttime", "{0:d}") %>'>
        </asp:Label>
    </ItemTemplate>
</asp:TemplateField>
